title: Add admin gift pack creation and management

requirements.text: Add a GiftPackForm component in frontend/src/components/admin that allows admins to create new gift packs with fields for: pack ID, title, description, price, discount percentage, category selection, image URL, basket type selection, and size selection. Use react-hook-form for validation and shadcn/ui components matching the existing ProductForm pattern.

quotes: add the ability to add gift packs by admin

acceptanceCriteria: Form includes all required fields: ID, title, description, price, discount, category, image URL, basket type, size
Form validation prevents submission with missing required fields
Category dropdown is populated from existing categories
Basket type and size use select components matching existing patterns
Form styling matches existing admin forms (CategoryForm, CouponForm)

requirements.text: Add a GiftPackList component in frontend/src/components/admin that displays all existing gift packs in a grid layout showing: image, title, price, discount, category, basket type, and size. Include loading states and empty state handling.

quotes: add the ability to add gift packs by admin

acceptanceCriteria: Displays all gift packs in a responsive grid
Shows key product details on each card
Includes loading skeleton during data fetch
Shows appropriate empty state when no gift packs exist

requirements.text: Add a GiftPackManagement component in frontend/src/components/admin that combines GiftPackForm and GiftPackList. Handle gift pack creation via the existing useProductMutation hook, display success/error toast notifications, and reset the form on successful creation.

quotes: add the ability to add gift packs by admin

acceptanceCriteria: Successfully creates gift packs using existing backend integration
Shows success toast notification after creation
Shows error toast if creation fails
Form resets to empty state after successful submission
Gift pack list automatically updates after creation

requirements.text: Update the AdminPage component to add a fourth management section for Gift Packs alongside the existing Categories, Products, and Coupons sections. Display the GiftPackManagement component in a Card with appropriate title and description.

quotes: add the ability to add gift packs by admin

acceptanceCriteria: Gift Pack Management section appears on admin dashboard
Section follows same visual styling as existing sections
Section includes clear title and description

constraints: Use existing useProductMutation hook for gift pack creation
Follow existing admin component patterns (CategoryForm, CouponForm, ProductForm)
Do not modify backend schema or main.mo actor
Use shadcn/ui components for form controls
Match existing Tailwind styling and theme
nonGoals: Editing or deleting existing gift packs
Gift pack image uploads (use URL input only)
